docs.abstract: Professor Adam Winkler’s latest book tracks how American businesses earned much the same civil rights as individual citizens.
docs.snippet: Professor Adam Winkler’s latest book tracks how American businesses earned much the same civil rights as individual citizens.
docs.lead_paragraph: The sheer volume of existing scholarship on the history of civil rights in the United States poses a formidable challenge to any academic seeking to say something new or unexpected. Adam Winkler, a professor at the law school at the University of California Los Angeles, has nonetheless managed to produce a work that is both engrossing and surprising. Professor Winkler has identified a secret parallel universe of civil rights whose beneficiaries are not the “discrete and insular minorities” whose protection were once the focus of the Supreme Court’s jurisprudence.

headline.main: Review: How Corporate America Won Its Civil Rights

keywords.name: creative_works
keywords.value: We the Corporations: How American Businesses Won Their Civil Rights (Book)

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Citizens United v Federal Election Commission (Supreme Court Decision)

docs.abstract: For decades, Steve Wynn used his persona and his name to promote his casino and hotel empire. To get past sexual misconduct allegations, it must act quickly, experts said.
docs.snippet: For decades, Steve Wynn used his persona and his name to promote his casino and hotel empire. To get past sexual misconduct allegations, it must act quickly, experts said.
docs.lead_paragraph: Steve Wynn is the name and face of Wynn Resorts.

headline.main: Steve Wynn’s Tarnished Name and Now a Tainted Brand
headline.print_headline: Steve Wynn’s Name  Has Been Tarnished.  Can His Brand Survive?

docs.abstract: Jerry Richardson has said he will sell the Carolina Panthers. But what does it take to become the next member of the exclusive N.F.L. team owners club?
docs.snippet: Jerry Richardson has said he will sell the Carolina Panthers. But what does it take to become the next member of the exclusive N.F.L. team owners club?
docs.lead_paragraph: After the last down is played and a new Super Bowl champion hoists the Lombardi Trophy on Sunday, the focus of the National Football League will turn to another prize: the sale of one of its 32 teams. The winning bidder will pay a huge sum for a property that is as close to a guarantee of fame and fortune as there can be.

headline.main: How to Bid for the N.F.L.’s Biggest Prize: Team Ownership
headline.print_headline: How to Bid for the N.F.L.’s Biggest Prize: Team Ownership

docs.abstract: To understand the wild swings on Wall Street, consider a farm town, a long drought and the cost of flood insurance.
docs.snippet: To understand the wild swings on Wall Street, consider a farm town, a long drought and the cost of flood insurance.
docs.lead_paragraph: To understand why global financial markets have been so volatile the last few weeks, imagine a town full of farmers who have been living through a decade-long drought.

headline.main: Why Markets Have Gotten So Jumpy
headline.print_headline: Why a Few Rain Clouds Started the Markets Convulsing

docs.abstract: The changes appear to address some common gripes, like how some posts can keep appearing on your feed seemingly for days.
docs.snippet: The changes appear to address some common gripes, like how some posts can keep appearing on your feed seemingly for days.
docs.lead_paragraph: Instagram is changing its algorithm to make things a little more timely.

headline.main: Instagram Is Changing Its Algorithm. Here’s How.

docs.abstract: The Fed’s sanctions against Wells Fargo are unprecedented. The question now is whether they are just a one-time action on an outlier.
docs.snippet: The Fed’s sanctions against Wells Fargo are unprecedented. The question now is whether they are just a one-time action on an outlier.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Federal Reserve imposed penalties on Wells Fargo the other week after a cascade of problems surfaced over the last two years, ranging from opening dummy accounts in the names of customers to forcing borrowers to take out unnecessary automobile insurance.

headline.main: What the Wells Fargo Crackdown Signals to Corporate America

docs.abstract: The lawsuit, which is seeking class-action status, claims the news and entertainment company marginalizes women and systematically pays them less than men.
docs.snippet: The lawsuit, which is seeking class-action status, claims the news and entertainment company marginalizes women and systematically pays them less than men.
docs.lead_paragraph: Vice Media, whose founders have already acknowledged a failure to “create a safe and inclusive workplace,” was sued Tuesday by a former employee who said the company marginalized women and systematically discriminated against them by paying men substantially more for similar work.

headline.main: Former Employee Sues Vice, Claiming It Pays Women Less
headline.print_headline: Former Employee Sues Vice,  Claiming It Pays Women Less

docs.abstract: The bond fund that he runs for Janus is down sharply this year, thanks partly to recent European market turmoil. That comes on the heels of a contentious divorce.
docs.snippet: The bond fund that he runs for Janus is down sharply this year, thanks partly to recent European market turmoil. That comes on the heels of a contentious divorce.
docs.lead_paragraph: William H. Gross, one of the world’s best-known investors, is having a very bad year.

headline.main: Bill Gross, Revered Fund Manager, Is Having a Year to Forget
headline.print_headline: For Investor, 2018 Can’t Get Much Worse

docs.abstract: When facilities are finished in 2023, they will improve efficiency at one of the country’s busiest airports, a hub for nine airlines with 329 daily flights.
docs.snippet: When facilities are finished in 2023, they will improve efficiency at one of the country’s busiest airports, a hub for nine airlines with 329 daily flights.
docs.lead_paragraph: SALT LAKE CITY — More than three years after construction was started to rebuild Salt Lake City International Airport and scrape away a collection of obsolete terminals, the contours of one of the nation’s largest air travel infrastructure projects are taking shape.

headline.main: Building a Modern Airport in Salt Lake City From One Well Past Its Prime
headline.print_headline: Building a Modern Airport From One Well Past Its Prime
